runDuration.notes: Set the duration for the bot to run, with constraints on the number of days (max 180), weeks (max 18), and months (max 3).

notesLanguage: Change to your language with ISO 639-1 code. Available languages: vi (Vietnamese), en (English)

whiteListMode.notes: If you enable this feature, only the IDs in the whiteListIds section can use the bot.

database.notes: Type selects 'json', 'sqlite', or 'mongodb'. If you choose mongodb, enter URI for connecting to mongodb in the uriMongodb section.

autoRestart.notes: You can set time as interval in milliseconds or cron time. Example: 1000, 10000, 60000, 3600000, 86400000, 0 0 * * *. Documentation: https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-cron.

autoUptime.notes: The value of timeInterval is in seconds. URL is the URL you want to send the request to (automatically detected for hosting glitch or replit).

autoLoadScripts.notes: This feature will automatically load the script when scripts have been changed. You can set ignoreCmds to ignore commands, and ignoreEvents to ignore events. Separate by comma or space.

restartListenMqtt.notes: The value of timeRestart and delayAfterStopListening is in milliseconds. You shouldn't edit this if you don't know what it is.

notiWhenListenMqttError.notes: This is the message when the bot is listening to the MQTT server and the MQTT server stops working due to account problems such as: locked account, blocked due to spam. The bot will automatically stop listening.

gmail.note: The bot will use gmailAccount to send email to emailGetNoti. Can send notifications to multiple emails, separate by comma or space.

telegram.note: Can send notifications to multiple chatIds, separate by comma or space.

discordHook.note: Can send notifications to multiple webhookUrls, separate by comma or space.

whiteListModeThread.notes: If you enable this feature, only the threads in the whiteListThreadIds list can use the bot.
whiteListModeThread.how_it_work: If you enable both whiteListMode and whiteListModeThread, the system will check if the user is in whiteListIds, then check if the thread is in whiteListThreadIds. If one of the conditions is met, the bot will work.
